author: taylor
msg: 1. Create User Pages from Roles on first login feature

author: antonio
msg: Deprecate method org.apache.cocoon.components.flow.FlowHelper.unwrap(Object). This method will be removed in 2.2 release. Use org.apache.cocoon.components.flow.util.PipelineUtil.unwrap(Object) instead.
